definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: The merchants lied at a caravanserai that night.
sentences.chinese: 商人們那天晚上在商隊旅館過夜。

sentences.english: Once upon a time, a certain tradesman was leading a caravan to another country to sell his goods.
sentences.chinese: 很久以前，有個大商人帶領商隊去另一個國家賣貨。

sentences.english: The interpreter of the caravan answered that we had come from the island of Syria with much merchandise.
sentences.chinese: 商隊的翻譯答道我們滿載着商貨自敘利亞的島嶼而來。

sentences.english: The caravan traveled by night and day in order to reach their destination on time.
sentences.chinese: 那支商隊披星戴月趕路，以便按時到達目的地。

sentences.english: Caravans of trade goods come overland, and great ships call from across the sea.
sentences.chinese: 運送貨物的商隊來往於大地，巨大的船隻橫穿海洋。

sentences.english: Once we were part of a caravan of twelve thousand camels.
sentences.chinese: 我們曾和一支有一萬二千頭駱駝的商隊一起行進。

sentences.english: Then they had taken for themselves all the merchandise and bullock carts of the caravan.
sentences.chinese: 然後他們就把商隊所有的貨物和牛車據爲己有。

sentences.english: Hassan and Nassau lead the caravan and sand fight.
sentences.chinese: 哈桑老人和兒子納蘇，帶領商隊與風沙搏鬥。

sentences.english: Before entering it, he called together all the members of the caravan.
sentences.chinese: 在進入森林之前，他把商隊的所有人員叫到一起。

sentences.english: In his last time Hassan let Nassau lead the whole caravan.
sentences.chinese: 彌留之際，老人把整個商隊的命運和未來交給了兒子。

sentences.english: In the distance, rewarding experience of the Muslim caravan was way back.
sentences.chinese: 在遠方，滿載而歸的穆斯林商隊正在返回的路上。

sentences.english: There were forty camels in the caravan, and the mules were twice forty in number.
sentences.chinese: 商隊有四十頭駱駝，騾子的數量則是駱駝的兩倍。

sentences.english: Caravan Soldiers become Foot Mercenaries and Foot Hired Blades.
sentences.chinese: 商隊士兵會升級到步戰僱傭兵和步戰職業殺手。

definition: slave-owning society (precedes feudal society 封建社會|封建社会 in Marxist theory)
Wusu city in Tacheng prefecture 塔城地區|塔城地区[Ta3 cheng2 di4 qu1], Xinjiang
Lop Nor, salt lake and nuclear testing site in Xinjiang
all black, no daylight (idiom); a world without justice
